publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3519 Fergus Ewing: Dentistry—That the Parliament notes that children’s registration with an NHS dental practice expires after a period of 15 months; believes that a child should be registered with a dentist until adulthood, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to amend the current rules governing registration of children with NHS dentists so that registration does not lapse in this way.

S1M-3519 Fergus Ewing: Dentistry—That the Parliament notes that children’s registration with an NHS dental practice expires after a period of 15 months; believes that a child should be registered with a dentist until adulthood, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to amend the current rules governing registration of children with NHS dentists so that registration does not lapse in this way.
S1M-3519 Dentistry (lodged on 29 October 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Mike Rumbles*
S1M-3519 Dentistry (lodged on 29 October 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-3519 Dentistry (lodged on 29 October 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-3519 Dentistry (lodged on 29 October 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-3519 Dentistry (lodged on 29 October 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-3519 Dentistry (lodged on 29 October 2002) Ms Sandra White*
